speaker: CAPULET
text:
Things
               
              have
               
              fallen
               
              out
              ,
               
              sir
              ,
               
              so
               
              unluckily

speaker: CAPULET
text:
That
               
              we
               
              have
               
              had
               
              no
               
              time
               
              to
               
              move
               
              our
               
              daughter
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Look
               
              you
              ,
               
              she
               
              loved
               
              her
               
              kinsman
               
              Tybalt
               
              dearly
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
And
               
              so
               
              did
               
              I
              .
               
              Well
              ,
               
              we
               
              were
               
              born
               
              to
               
              die
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
’Tis
               
              very
               
              late
              .
               
              She’ll
               
              not
               
              come
               
              down
               
              tonight
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
I
               
              promise
               
              you
              ,
               
              but
               
              for
               
              your
               
              company
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
I
               
              would
               
              have
               
              been
               
              abed
               
              an
               
              hour
               
              ago
              .

speaker: PARIS
text:
These
               
              times
               
              of
               
              woe
               
              afford
               
              no
               
              times
               
              to
               
              woo
              .
              —

speaker: PARIS
text:
Madam
              ,
               
              good
               
              night
              .
               
              Commend
               
              me
               
              to
               
              your
               
              daughter
              .

speaker:
LADY
               
              CAPULET
text:
I
               
              will
              ,
               
              and
               
              know
               
              her
               
              mind
               
              early
               
              tomorrow
              .

speaker:
LADY
               
              CAPULET
text:
Tonight
               
              she’s
               
              mewed
               
              up
               
              to
               
              her
               
              heaviness
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Sir
               
              Paris
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              make
               
              a
               
              desperate
               
              tender

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Of
               
              my
               
              child’s
               
              love
              .
               
              I
               
              think
               
              she
               
              will
               
              be
               
              ruled

speaker: CAPULET
text:
In
               
              all
               
              respects
               
              by
               
              me
              .
               
              Nay
              ,
               
              more
              ,
               
              I
               
              doubt
               
              it
               
              not
              .
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Wife
              ,
               
              go
               
              you
               
              to
               
              her
               
              ere
               
              you
               
              go
               
              to
               
              bed
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Acquaint
               
              her
               
              here
               
              of
               
              my
               
              son
               
              Paris’
               
              love
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
And
               
              bid
               
              her
              —
              mark
               
              you
               
              me
              ?
              —
              on
               
              Wednesday
               
              next
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
But
               
              soft
              ,
               
              what
               
              day
               
              is
               
              this
              ?

speaker: PARIS
text:
Monday
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Monday
              ,
               
              ha
               
              ha
              !
               
              Well
              ,
               
              Wednesday
               
              is
               
              too
               
              soon
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
O’
               
              Thursday
               
              let
               
              it
               
              be
              .
              —
              O’
               
              Thursday
              ,
               
              tell
               
              her
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
She
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              married
               
              to
               
              this
               
              noble
               
              earl
              .
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Will
               
              you
               
              be
               
              ready
              ?
               
              Do
               
              you
               
              like
               
              this
               
              haste
              ?

speaker: CAPULET
text:
We’ll
               
              keep
               
              no
               
              great
               
              ado
              :
               
              a
               
              friend
               
              or
               
              two
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
For
               
              hark
               
              you
              ,
               
              Tybalt
               
              being
               
              slain
               
              so
               
              late
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
It
               
              may
               
              be
               
              thought
               
              we
               
              held
               
              him
               
              carelessly
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Being
               
              our
               
              kinsman
              ,
               
              if
               
              we
               
              revel
               
              much
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Therefore
               
              we’ll
               
              have
               
              some
               
              half
               
              a
               
              dozen
               
              friends
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
And
               
              there
               
              an
               
              end
              .
               
              But
               
              what
               
              say
               
              you
               
              to
               
              Thursday
              ?

speaker: PARIS
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              I
               
              would
               
              that
               
              Thursday
               
              were
               
              tomorrow
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Well
              ,
               
              get
               
              you
               
              gone
              .
               
              O’
               
              Thursday
               
              be
               
              it
              ,
               
              then
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
To
                 
                Lady
                 
                Capulet
                .
                 
              
              Go
               
              you
               
              to
               
              Juliet
               
              ere
               
              you
               
              go
               
              to
               
              bed
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Prepare
               
              her
              ,
               
              wife
              ,
               
              against
               
              this
               
              wedding
               
              day
              .
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              my

              .
              —
              Light
               
              to
               
              my

              ,
               
              ho
              !
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Afore
               
              me
              ,
               
              it

              late
               
              that
               
              we

text:
May
